speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is he. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: My name is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm reaching out regarding your account with City Bank. Can you please verify your date of birth for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Johnson. Could you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I can confirm you have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment of $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. Would you like to pay by debit card or bank transfer?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! Please provide your card number when you're ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Your payment has been processed. Have a great day!
